comment: Rubbish Hillary ! I am an Australian living near the fires & the causes of the fires have been : . Arson with approx arrests made . Lack of hazard reduction , & . Drought , which a normal cyclic occurrence in Australia . Stop spreading <URL>

(m / multi-sentence

                        :op4 (d / drought

                                          :ARG2 c)))))
            :snt2 (s2 / stop-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG0 (p2 / person
                        :name (n4 / name
                              :op1 "Hillary"))
                  :ARG1 (s3 / spread-03
